description: SessionTokenCreateRequestUser defines per-session user-specific data for `/session/token/create`

client_user_id.description: A unique ID representing the end user. Typically this will be a user ID number from your application. Personally identifiable information, such as an email address or phone number, should not be used in the `client_user_id`. It is currently used as a means of searching logs for the given user in the Plaid Dashboard.
